title: Zebra Technologies Has Another Strong Earnings Showing
text:
Industrial productivity-solutions provider Zebra Technologies celebrated a five-year anniversary with another strong earnings report. It has been quite a ride for investors since Zebra doubled the size of the company with the October 2014 purchase of Motorola Solutions Inc.’s enterprise business.

The company earned $3.43 a share in the third quarter, better than Wall Street had predicted. Results exceeded even Zebra’s guidance given earlier in 2019. Shares (ticker: ZBRA) rose almost $15, or 6.7%, to $237.64 on Tuesday. Year-to-date...
description: The company earned $3.43 a share in the third quarter, better than Wall Street had predicted. Results exceeded even Zebra’s guidance given earlier in 2019.
